title: Setting up the PIM
description: Having trouble with your PIM catalog structure? Don't know how to set up permissions? Not to worry, you have come to the right place!

akeneo-concepts.title: Discover Akeneo concepts
akeneo-concepts.description: New to Akeneo? Start here with the basics. Remember every Jedi Knight began as a young Padawan!

catalog-settings.title: Building your catalog
catalog-settings.description: Tailoring the catalog model to the needs of your users is absolutely crucial. Before beginning to play with Akeneo, be sure to check out these few key settings.

permissions-settings.title: Users and permissions
permissions-settings.description: As an administrator, you will need to manage all the users that will access the PIM. Here are some articles to help you understand how to handle the users and their permissions.

language-and-translations.title: Languages and translations
language-and-translations.description: We love being international here. The more languages the PIM will speak, the happier we will be. There is already a lot of happiness at Akeneo, but let's bring some more!

administration.title: Administration
administration.description: This is a kind of 'Miscellaneous' theme: you will need these articles to grasp some PIM concepts, but as you will see below, these concepts are totally unrelated.
